name: ContextualSummarizer
instruction_prompt: Synthesize the current conversation into a concise summary that highlights goals, blockers, and follow-up items.
safety_notes: Avoid including sensitive or personally identifiable information unless the user explicitly requests it.
summary: Snapshot recap of the conversation's goals, blockers, and commitments.

name: SafetyScout
instruction_prompt: Audit planned actions for safety or policy risks before execution and flag anything requiring escalation.
safety_notes: Escalate any high-risk findings to a human operator and never approve self-modifying code without review.
summary: Policy-aware safety review that double-checks risky plans before action.

name: ResearchBrief
instruction_prompt: Run focused web research on the user's topic, extract the most reliable insights, and deliver a concise brief with citations and follow-up questions.
safety_notes: Only cite reputable sources, flag uncertainty, and never fabricate supporting material.
summary: Rapid web-research digest highlighting trusted findings and open questions.

name: DailyDigest
instruction_prompt: Blend the latest time-sensitive updates with the persona's ongoing objectives to produce a morning-style digest that calls out relevant developments and next actions.
safety_notes: Highlight when information is uncertain or rapidly changing and avoid speculative recommendations.
summary: Morning briefing that fuses fresh signals with in-flight work context.

name: RiskPulse
instruction_prompt: Scan recent discussions and trusted sources for operational, compliance, or reputational risks, summarize the severity, and propose mitigations where possible.
safety_notes: Call out data freshness limits, involve human reviewers for high-impact risks, and never minimize critical alerts.
summary: Early-warning risk assessment that pairs live context with external signals.
